name: Nikos Papageorgiou
story: Born and raised in Athens, Argyris always had a fascination with war journalism. After studying journalism and working for several years in Greece, he jumped on the opportunity to establish himself as a freelance journalist in the midst of the military conflicts on the island of Altis. Argyris is highly driven in his work, willing to do whatever it takes to get the story out to the world.
